Regulation Name(s): Fibrinogen and Fibrin Split Products, Antigen, Antiserum, Control (Assay)
Multipurpose System for In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACL AcuStar analyzer, HemosIL AcuStar D-Dimer chemiluminescent immunoassay, and D-Dimer Controls for quantitative D-Dimer determination in citrated plasma as aid in diagnosing venous thromboembolism.
Indications for Use Summary: ACL AcuStar is an automated immunoassay analyzer for clinical laboratory use; HemosIL AcuStar D-Dimer is a fully automated chemiluminescent immunoassay for quantitative determination of D-Dimer in human citrated plasma as an aid in the diagnosis of venous thromboembolism (DVT and PE); D-Dimer Controls are for quality control of the assay on the ACL AcuStar.
